summary: This document is a July 2021 letter from The School District of Palm Beach County, Florida, responding to a subpoena or records request by releasing a student's records. It is addressed to an unspecified recipient and signed by two district officials.

persons.name: Dawn Pumphrey
persons.context: Appears as the signatory and Director of IT Enterprise Applications for The School District of Palm Beach County, responsible for releasing student records in response to a subpoena/request.

persons.name: Deepak Agarwal
persons.context: Appears as the co-signatory and Chief Information Officer for The School District of Palm Beach County, involved in the release of student records in response to a subpoena/request.

connections.description: Both are officials within the IT Enterprise Applications department of The School District of Palm Beach County, jointly signing the letter releasing student records.

events.title: Release of Student Records
events.description: The School District of Palm Beach County responds to a subpoena or records request by releasing a student's records.

locations: 3300 Forest Hill Boulevard, Suite 6.241, West Palm Beach, FL 33406
keyFacts: The School District of Palm Beach County released student records in July 2021 in response to a subpoena or records request.
The release was authorized and signed by Dawn Pumphrey, Director of IT Enterprise Applications, and Deepak Agarwal, Chief Information Officer.
The document does not specify the identity of the student, the requester, or the legal case involved.
The document is part of the Epstein case document set (EFTA00098327), suggesting the records request is related to investigations into Jeffrey Epstein or associates.
The document is a formal administrative response, indicating legal or investigative scrutiny of individuals connected to Palm Beach County schools.
